lexa.core.data

Interface DataArray

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataArray>, DataFactoryItem, java.lang.Iterable<DataValue>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayDataArray, BaseDataArray, ConfigDataArray, HashDataArray

    public interface DataArray
extends java.lang.Iterable<DataValue>, java.lang.Comparable<DataArray>, DataFactoryItem
    An array of values The array is self sizing, as it is implemented as a linked list. The values are polymorphic as they are always held as DataValue objects.
    Since:
    2015-03
    Author:
    william

    • Method Detail

      • add

        DataArray add(java.lang.Object object)
        Add an object to the array.

        The value is added added to the end of the array. The following are equivalent: 

        
	va.add(obj);
	va.add(new SimpleValue(obj));
	va.add(obj, va.size);
	va.add(new SimpleValue(obj), va.size);
        Parameters:
        object - the object to add
        Returns:
        this DataArray

      • add

        DataArray add(DataValue value)
        Add a value to the array.

        The value is added added to the end of the array. The following are equivalent: 

        
	va.add(val);
	va.add(val, va.size);
        Parameters:
        value - the value to add
        Returns:
        this DataArray

      • add

        DataArray add(int index,
              java.lang.Object object)
        Add an object to the array at a given position.

        The value is added added to the array at the given position. The following are equivalent: 

        
	va.add(obj, pos);
	va.add(new SimpleValue(obj), pos);
        Parameters:
        index - the position for the object
        object - the value to add
        Returns:
        this DataArray

      • add

        DataArray add(int index,
              DataValue value)
        Add a value to the array at a given position.

        The value is added added to the array at the given position. The position must be in the range of 0 to the size of the array. If the position is equal to the size, then the new item will be added to the end.

        Parameters:
        index - the position for the object
        value - the value to add
        Returns:
        this DataArray

      • addAll

        DataArray addAll(DataArray array)
        Add all the values to the array.

        The values are added to the array at the end.

        Parameters:
        array - a DataArray to add
        Returns:
        this DataArray

      • addAll

        DataArray addAll(java.lang.Object[] array)
        Add all the values to the array.

        The values are added to the array at the end.

        Parameters:
        array - an array to add
        Returns:
        this DataArray

      • get

        DataValue get(int index)
        Get the value at a position.
        Parameters:
        index - position of required value
        Returns:
        the value corresponding to the position

      • remove

        DataValue remove(int index)
        Remove the value at a position.
        Parameters:
        index - position of value to be removed
        Returns:

      • size

        int size()
        Get the size of the array.
        Returns:
